title: Pixel 3 Device gets too warm while charging
content:
I bought Pixel 3 just a week ago. I'm experiencing unusual heating issues. 

Device gets heated up
1. While charging with device switched on
2. While charging with device switched off
3. While doing a video call
4. While uploading large files to Google Photos via Wi-Fi
5. While shooting a video

Am I the only to experience this? Is it normal?
